explains: n. 转位；混乱；[医] 脱臼
wordGroup: dislocation density 位错密度；差排密度
screw dislocation 螺旋位错；螺旋变位
edge dislocation 刃型位错；边缘位错；刃差排

sentences.en: These policies could cause severe economic and social dislocation.
sentences.cn: 这些政策可能引起严重的经济和社会混乱。

sentences.en: Millions of refugees have suffered a total dislocation of their lives.
sentences.cn: 几百万难民饱受生活颠沛流离之苦。

sentences.en: A doctor can reduce a fracture or dislocation.
sentences.cn: 医生能使骨折或脱臼复原。
